title: Just My Size Wireless Bra Pack, Full Coverage, Leopard Satin, Wirefree Plus-Size Bra; aizes from 32C to 50DD; ajustable straps in the front; 90% nylon, 10% spandex; everyday bra pack and 1 satin bra; leopard print and other colors (white, nude, and others)
descriptions:
Introducing the Just My Size Wireless Bra Pack, a full coverage, plus-size bra designed for ultimate comfort and style. This bra pack includes a stunning leopard satin bra, available in sizes ranging from 32C to 50DD.

Crafted with 90% nylon and 10% spandex, this bra offers the perfect blend of durability and flexibility. The adjustable front straps ensure a customizable fit for all-day comfort. The wide band and rows of hook-and-eye closures provide additional support and security.

This bra boasts a wireless design, making it an excellent choice for those who prefer a more natural feel. The full coverage cups offer maximum support and a flattering fit. The leopard print pattern is complemented by a variety of color options, including white, nude, and others, ensuring there's a style to suit every taste.

The Just My Size Wireless Bra Pack is more than just a bra; it's a statement of comfort and style. Experience the perfect blend of fashion and functionality with this must-have addition to your wardrobe.
